_description: Refusal Accountability policy. Ensures transparent, auditable refusals with clear reason codes. Every VOID must be explainable and logged.

F1.description: Action would cause irreversible harm or violate trust covenant

F2.description: Response cannot meet truth floor requirements

F3.description: Human-AI-Earth witnesses did not achieve agreement

F4.description: Response would increase confusion rather than reduce it

F5.description: Action would be destructive or harmful

F6.description: Response fails to serve weakest stakeholder

F9.description: AI claimed consciousness, feelings, or biological states

SAFETY.description: Request violates safety guidelines (weapons, harm, illegal)

DESTRUCTIVE.description: Query contains destruction + critical target combination

user_messages.general_refusal: I cannot assist with that request.
user_messages.with_reason: I cannot assist with that request ({reason}).
user_messages.with_guidance: I cannot assist with that request ({reason}). {guidance}
user_messages.escalation_notice: Multiple similar requests have been declined. A human review may be required to proceed.

guidance_templates.F1_AMANAH: Please rephrase your request to avoid potentially harmful outcomes.
guidance_templates.F5_PEACE_SQUARED: Consider alternative approaches that don't involve destructive actions.
guidance_templates.F9_ANTI_HANTU: I can provide factual information but cannot claim human-like experiences.
guidance_templates.SAFETY_REFUSAL: For safety information, please consult official resources or professionals.
guidance_templates.DESTRUCTIVE_INTENT: I'm designed to help constructively. How can I assist you differently?
